"Souya": "There's a wealth of valuable resources to be found here in Stia."
"Make sure you get a grasp on each of their characteristics to make the most of them."
"Thanks to that, our material shortage has improved, if only slightly."
"That being said, things are still far from perfect."
"I'd like to ask another favor of you; would you be willing to hear me out?"
"If you go to Felusa Ridge, you should be able to find those \"Ore Clusters\"."
"I see... Well, let me know when you change your mind."
